verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] “ seriously considering ” breaking up joint talks with Canada and Mexico to rewrite the North American Free Trade Agreement in favor of parallel , bilateral negotiations , White House economic adviser Larry Kudlow said .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is “ [ARGM-MNR: seriously] [V: considering] ” [ARG1: breaking up joint talks with Canada and Mexico to rewrite the North American Free Trade Agreement in favor of parallel , bilateral negotiations] , White House economic adviser Larry Kudlow said .
